official_title: To provide for the transfer of certain real property to the National Park Service for inclusion in the Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River.

summary.text: Transfers certain real property in New Jersey and Pennsylvania to the National Park Service for inclusion in the Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River.
